Class Subnet

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.platform.Subnet

public final class Subnet
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an internet subnet.

Joerg Rathlev

isValidNetmask

public static boolean isValidNetmask(java.net.InetAddress address)
Checks if the given address is a valid netmask.

Parameters:
address - the address to check.
Returns:
true if the address is a netmask, false otherwise.

Returns whether this subnet contains the given address.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a string representation of this subnet. The returned string will be in the format address/netmask.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

parseSubnet

public static Subnet parseSubnet(java.lang.String s)
Parses the given string into a Subnet. The string must be in the form address/netmask.

Parameters:
s - the string.
Returns:
the subnet.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the string is not a valid subnet address.
